mapper.select: select b.seq, b.user_seq, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count, b.is_draft, b.route_seq from board b, users u where b.user_seq = u.seq and is_draft=1 order by b.reg_dt desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into board(user_seq, title, content, route_seq) values ( #{user_seq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{route_seq} ); insert into board ( user_seq, title, content, reg_dt ) values ( #{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.delete: delete from route where seq = #{board_seq} and user_seq=#{user_seq};
